price: Hindi ba nakaaalam ang lumikha [ng lahat] samantalang Siya ay ang Mapagtalos,[657] ang Mapagbatid?
arabic: أَلَا يَعۡلَمُ مَنۡ خَلَقَ وَهُوَ ٱللَّطِيفُ ٱلۡخَبِيرُ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: alā yaʿlamu man khalaqa wahuwa al-laṭīfu al-khabīru
